name: Towerbots
description:
This is a tower defense strategy game.

In the game, you will use gold coins to build defense towers to destroy the army of passing robots. Choose the right defensive tower according to the terrain advantage, you can save yourself from danger!

Free combination with a variety of defense towers

The game provides a variety of defense towers, efficient damage, special effects, whatever you choose. Different defense towers interact well. Ingenious combination is waiting for you to explore!
